response.raw:
Here is a draft client-ready memo for that task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Subject: Follow-up on Your Recent Claim

Dear [Customer Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out regarding the claim you filed on [date] for [brief claim description].

Our investigation of your claim is now complete. I'm pleased to inform you that we have approved [details of approved amount/coverage]. [If applicable: We have made the following adjustments to your claim: [list adjustments].]

A detailed explanation of our findings and any adjustments has been mailed to the address on file. You should receive this documentation within 5-7 business days.

If you have any questions about your claim or our decision, please don't hesitate to contact me directly at [phone number] or reply to this email. I'm here to assist you.

Thank you for your patience during our review process. We appreciate your business and the trust you place in us.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Senior Claims Representative
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
